thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 3 of 171
thread.title: Jo Nicholson

author: Jo Nicholson
title: Jo Nicholson
text: We love trusted housesitters. The system of getting verifications of ID and background checks helps homeowners feel more confident in us as sitters, and the provided vet line means we can sit with confidence ourselves and get advice when we need it. The website is super easy to use, and the fact we can secure external references as well as direct ones helps to boost our credibility too.
